/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky above. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation system. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting soft shadows and highlighting the colors of the cityscape.
